Articles.Content:
I made a rotating ring station in KSP 2 with a stock bearing, it took some time and modifications to game files to get this wobbly monstrosity to orbit (mainly tweaked JOINT_RIGIDITY in the physics section of the global game files). After getting to orbit I spun the stage and it worked like a charm so KSP 2 community I challenge you to make a ring station in Dres orbit at it's ring inclination and preferably in visible range of the ring (i.e. inside the ring itself or just outside or below in orbit of the Dres ring system)

Heres the link to a shor video of it rotating Reddit
Those are fun. Congratulations on your build.
